From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2022 Indian Hindi filme


Kaun Pravin Tambe?Official release posterDirected byJayprad DesaiWritten byKiran YadnyopavitProduced byShital BhatiaSudip TewariStarringShreyas TalpadeAshish VidyarthiParambrata ChatterjeeAnjali PatilCinematographySudheer PalsaneEdited byGhorakshnath KhandeMusic bySai-PiyushProductioncompaniesFox Star StudiosFriday FilmWorksBootroom SportsDistributed byDisney+ HotstarRelease date
1 April 2022 (2022-04-01)
Running time134 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Kaun Pravin Tambe?  (transl. Who is Pravin Tambe?) is a 2022 Indian Hindi-language biographical sports drama film directed by Jayprad Desai. It is based on the life of Indian cricketer Pravin Tambe. The film stars Shreyas Talpade and premiered on Disney+ Hotstar on 1 April 2022.[1]
This was the last film to be released under the Fox Star Studios name before being rebranded to Star Studios on 27 May 2022.


Cast[edit]

Shreyas Talpade as Pravin Tambe
Ashish Vidyarthi as Vidya Paradkar, Coach of Orient Shipping
Parambrata Chatterjee as Rajat Sanyal, a sports journalist
Anjali Patil as Vaishali Tambe, Pravin's wife
Shekar Betkar as Bandu
Aditi Patil as Deepa Tambe
Nyshita Bajaj as Pari Tambe
Chhaya Kadam as Jyothi Tambe, Pravin's mother
Arun Nalawade as Vijay Tambe, Pravin's father
Nitin Rao as Abey Kuruvilla
Chirag Trivedi as Rahul Dravid
Prasad Oak as Vijay Patil
Ajinkya Date as Jatin
Gaurav Kamble as Shyam
Asif Ali as Journalist Kishore
Vedant Mishra as Vikas
Ankur Dabas as Ajay Kadam
Jagdish Chavan as Jagdish

Soundtrack[edit]
Music composed by Anurag Saikia.

No.TitleLyricsMusicSinger(s)Length1."Khamakha"Shakeel AzmiAnurag SaikiaVivek Hariharan, Anurag Saikia2:46Total length:2:46
Release[edit]
The film premiered on Disney+ Hotstar on 1 April 2022, in Hindi also dubbed in Tamil as Yaar Pravin Tambe? and Telugu as Pravin Tambe Evaru?.[2]

Reception[edit]
Devesh Sharma of Filmfare rated the film 4 out of 5 stars and wrote "Director Jayprad Desai has given us a pulsating human drama in the guise of a sports biopic".[3] Pallabi Dey Purkayastha of The Times of India rated the film 3.5 out of 5 stars and wrote "
Unless you are venturing into the sports biopic genre with 'Kaun Pravin Tambe?'—let's be honest here—it will not leave you stupefied."[4] Saibal Chatterjee of NDTV rated the film 3 out of 5 stars and wrote "It pieces together a fascinating life story that is much more about dour tenacity than about flashy achievements and staggering statistics".[5] Anna M. M. Vetticad of Firstpost rated the film 3 out of 5 stars and wrote "Few Indian actors are as qualified to take on Pravin Tambe's biopic as the Hindi-Marathi star Shreyas Talpade who first attracted the national spotlight playing a deaf-mute cricketer in Nagesh Kukunoor's 2005 film Iqbal.[6] Rohan Naahar of Indian Express rated the film 2 out of 5 stars and wrote "Shreyas Talpade delivers an earnest performance in Hotstar's unmemorable cricket biopic, which feels like reading a dozen editions of the Wisden almanac back-to-back".[7]

References[edit]


^ "Pravin Tambe biopic starring Shreyas Talpade to release on Disney+ Hotstar". The Hindu. 8 March 2022. Retrieved 10 March 2022.

^ "Latest News, Breaking News Today - Bollywood, Cricket, Business, Politics - IndiaToday". India Today. 10 March 2022. Retrieved 10 March 2022.

^ "Kaun Pravin Tambe Movie Review". Filmfare. Retrieved 5 April 2022.

^ "Kaun Pravin Tambe? Review: Shreyas Talpade's sports saga is sincere but sluggish". The Times Of India. Retrieved 5 April 2022.

^ Chatterjee, Saibal (1 April 2022). "Kaun Pravin Tambe? Review: Sports Biopic Is Both Entertaining And Engaging". NDTV. Retrieved 4 June 2022.

^ "Kaun Pravin Tambe? movie review: Engaging cricket drama based on an inspiring true story". Firstpost. April 2022. Retrieved 5 April 2022.

^ "Kaun Pravin Tambe movie review: Hotstar biopic drops the ball despite a fine knock by Shreyas Talpade". Indian Express. 2 April 2022. Retrieved 5 April 2022.
